// e2.txt
//
// These are the official Eternity II pieces. Of course this puzzle and it's
// prize have long since expired, but they are still fun to play around with.
//
// Below are some sample boards and their solutions:
//
// W  H  Solutions
// -- -- ---------
// 4  4  809
// 5  5  2,297,703
// 6  6  24,137,633,949
// 8  8  ????
// 16 16 ???? (Hopefully at least 1 solution... never seen one...)
//
// Here are solution counts for specific board types:
// TL = top left corner (use --bt7)
// BR = bottom right corner (use --bt3)
// Edge = any edge (i.e. --bt4)
// Middle = no edges (use --bt5)
//
// W  H  Type   Solutions
// -- -- ------ ---------
// 2  2  TL     346
// 2  2  BR     966
// 2  2  Edge   73,003
// 2  2  Middle 4,059,952
// 3  3  TL     721,207
// 3  3  BR     1,912,014
// 3  3  Edge   595,003,203
// 3  3  Middle 126,907,480,216
// 4  4  TL     8,202,087,293
// 4  4  BR     21,573,026,278
// 4  4  Edge   26,868,130,739,598
// 4  4  Middle ????

// 1-8
// 8dfe
0 0 1 3
0 0 1 4
0 0 2 3
0 0 3 2
0 1 6 1
0 1 7 2
0 1 9 1
0 1 9 5

// 9-16
// c174

0 1 14 4
0 1 15 2
0 1 19 4
0 1 19 5
0 1 21 4
0 2 7 1
0 2 8 3

0 2 18 1
